feed.title: Cleanuparr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix validations and increased strikes limits by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.9...v2.0.10

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for basic auth for Apprise by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.10...v2.0.11

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add failed import reasons to logs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/230
  • Add support for Apprise tags by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/229
  • Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/228
  • Add Whisparr support by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/215
  • Fix arr max strikes not being used instead of global setting by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.11...v2.0.12

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add more logs for debug by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/201
  • Improve download removal to be separate from download search by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/233
  • Add handling type of malware when containing thepirateheaven.org file by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.12...v2.0.13

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve torrent protocol detection by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.13...v2.0.14
